alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; Fairfield; Kershaw; Lancaster; Lee (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 5:55PM EDT until June 16 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Fairfield County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Lancaster County in central South Carolina... Northern Lee County in central South Carolina... South central Chesterfield County in central South Carolina... Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 554 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Westville to near Lugoff, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Camden, Bishopville, Lake Wateree Dam, Lee State Park, Westville, Longtown, Cassatt, Liberty Hill, Goodale State Park, Lake Wateree State Park, Mcbee, Bethune, Lucknow, North Central High School, Dekalb, North Towne Square Shopping Center, Antioch, Midway Elementary School, Pine Grove Fire Station and Woodward Airfield. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 115 and 126. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
